metadata.title: CVE-2017-17531 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: gozilla.c in GNU GLOBAL 4.8.6 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: global package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.2-1').
